description: The two classic stories of the Three Kittens and Chicken Little (Henny Penny) translated into the Cherokee Language. Cherokee Syllabary only. Suitable for young native readers and students of the language. ᏔᎵ ᏗᎧᏃᎮᏗ Ꮎ ᎠᏂᏦᎢ ᏪᏌ ᎠᏂᏓ ᎠᎴ ᏥᏔᎦ ᎤᏍᏗ. ᏂᎦᏓ ᏣᎳᎩ ᎦᏬᏂᎯᏍᏗ. ᎥᏝ ᎩᎵᏏ ᏱᎩ. ᏌᏊ ᎢᏳᏩᎦᏘ ᎠᏂᏦᎢ ᏪᏌ ᎠᏂᏓ ᎡᏁᎮ . . .
subjects: Foreign Language Study, Native American Languages
title: Na Anijoi Wesa Anida ale Jitaga Usdi - The Three Kittens and Chicken Little
